data.text: Sɛdeɛ nwansena funu ma aduhwam yi nka bɔne no,
Onyansafoɔ akoma kom kɔ nifa,
Mpo sɛ ɔkwasea nam ɛkwan so a
Sɛ sodifoɔ bo fu wo a,
Bɔne bi wɔ hɔ a mahunu wɔ owia yi ase.
Wɔma nkwaseafoɔ diberɛ a ɛkorɔn,
Mahunu nkoa sɛ wɔtete apɔnkɔ so,
Obiara a ɔtu amena no bɛtumi atɔ mu;
Obiara a ɔpae aboɔ no, aboɔ no bɛtumi apira no;
Sɛ abonnua ano akum
Sɛ ɔwɔ ka obi ansa na wɔadwodwo no a
Onyansafoɔ anom nsɛm yɛ nyam,
Ahyɛaseɛ no, ne nsɛm yɛ nkwaseasɛm;
na ɔkwasea woro nsɛm.
Ɔkwasea adwumayɛ ma ɔbrɛ;
Nnome nka wo, asase a na wo ɔhene yɛ akwa
Nhyira nka wo, asase a wo ɔhene yɛ ɔdehyeɛ
Sɛ obi yɛ akwadworɔ a, ne mpunan yɛ mmerɛ;
Wɔto ɛpono ma sereɛ,
Wʼadwene mu mpo, nkasa ntia ɔhene,
